duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate client's physical functional ability, establish and progressively revise treatment plans, treat and/or supervise treatment of client, teach client and family, communicate with appropriate medical and rehabilitation personnel, and document the above.
Use problem-solving skills, collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to solve clinical problems that require a professional level of knowledge in a specific discipline.
Demonstrate good communication skills (verbal/written) and active listening skills, giving directions and information, problem solving, and making independent decisions.
Handle interruptions and stressful situations while prioritizing, organizing, and using management skills optimally.

Respond in an emergency situation appropriately and follow existing procedures and instructions, while receiving assignments in the form of results expected, due dates, and general procedures to follow.
